trans-unit.source: Obtains information about the COM+ object context.
trans-unit.target: 取得 COM + 物件內容的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: ContextUtil is the preferred class to use for obtaining COM+ context information.
trans-unit.target: ContextUtil 是慣用的類別，用來取得 COM + 內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Because the members of this class are all `static` (`shared` in Visual Basic), it is not necessary to instantiate it before using them.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個類別的成員都`static`(`shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，則不需要使用之前先將它執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: Gets a GUID representing the activity containing the component.
trans-unit.target: 取得 GUID，代表包含元件的活動。

trans-unit.source: The GUID for an activity if the current context is part of an activity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_GUID_NULL" name="GUID_NULL" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的內容屬於活動; 活動 GUID否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_GUID_NULL" name="GUID_NULL" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a GUID for the current application.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID for the current application.
trans-unit.target: 目前應用程式 GUID。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows XP or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows XP 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a GUID for the current application instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式執行個體的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID for the current application instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前的應用程式執行個體的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows XP or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows XP 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a GUID for the current context.
trans-unit.target: 針對目前的內容取得的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID for the current context.
trans-unit.target: 目前內容的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""></xref> bit in the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""> </xref> COM + 內容中的位元。

trans-unit.source: The COM+ `done` bit determines how long the object remains active after finishing its work and can affect the duration of a transaction.
trans-unit.target: COM +`done`元決定多久物件仍會維持使用中之後完成其工作，而且可能會影響交易的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: When a method call returns, COM+ inspects the `done` bit.
trans-unit.target: 當方法呼叫傳回時，COM + 會檢查`done`位元。

trans-unit.source: If the `done` bit is `true`, COM+ deactivates the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`done`個位元都是`true`，COM + 停用該物件。

trans-unit.source: If the `done` bit is `false`, the object is not deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 如果`done`個位元都是`false`，物件不會停用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is to be deactivated when the method returns; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件是停用此方法會傳回。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Sets both the <xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""></xref> bit and the <xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""></xref> bit to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 同時設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""></xref>位元和<xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""></xref>位元<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> COM + 內容中。

trans-unit.source: If asked, the COM+ context votes to abort the current transaction, but the object is not deactivated on method return.
trans-unit.target: 如果系統詢問，COM + 內容投票中止目前的交易，但是方法返回時不停用的物件。

trans-unit.source: No COM+ context is available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有 COM + 內容可供使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""></xref> bit to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""></xref> bit to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""></xref>位元<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""></xref>位元<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> COM + 內容中。

trans-unit.source: If asked, the COM+ context will commit the current transaction, but the object is not deactivated on method return.
trans-unit.target: COM + 內容要求，如果將會認可目前交易，但不是會在方法傳回時停用物件。

trans-unit.source: No COM+ context is available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有 COM + 內容可供使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a named property from the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 從 COM + 內容傳回具名的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for obtaining the Internet Information Services (IIS) intrinsic objects provided by Active Server Pages (ASP).
trans-unit.target: 這是用於取得提供由 Active Server Pages (ASP) 的網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 內建函式物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the requested property.
trans-unit.target: 要求的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The named property for the context.
trans-unit.target: 內容之具名的屬性。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the caller is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 判斷呼叫端是否在指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the caller is in the specified role; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果呼叫端在指定的角色。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the serviced component is activated in the default context.
trans-unit.target: 判斷服務的元件是否已啟動預設內容。

trans-unit.source: Serviced components that do not have COM+ catalog information are activated in the default context.
trans-unit.target: 沒有 COM + 目錄資訊的服務的元件都會啟用預設內容。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the serviced component is activated in the default context; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**服務的元件是否已啟用預設內容; 否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current context is transactional.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的內容是否為交易式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current context is transactional; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的內容是交易式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether role-based security is active in the current context.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否為目前的內容中使用以角色為基礎的安全性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current context has security enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的內容已啟用; 安全性否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""></xref> bit in the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""> </xref> COM + 內容中的位元。

trans-unit.source: When MyTransactionVote is set to `Commit`, the COM+ `consistent` bit is set to `true` and the COM+ context votes to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 當 MyTransactionVote 設`Commit`，COM +`consistent`位元設為`true`及認可交易表決 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: If MyTransactionVote is set to `Abort`, the `consistent` bit is set to `false` and the COM+ context votes to abort the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 MyTransactionVote `Abort`、`consistent`位元設為`false`和 COM + 內容投票中止交易。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the `consistent` bit is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值`consistent`個位元都是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The `consistent` bit casts a vote to commit or abort the transaction in which it executes, and the `done` bit finalizes the vote.
trans-unit.target: `consistent`元將轉換投票，以認可或中止的交易中執行，而`done`元終結投票。

trans-unit.source: COM+ inspects the `consistent` bit when the `done` bit is set to `true` on a method call return or when the object deactivates.
trans-unit.target: COM + 會檢查`consistent`位元時`done`位元設為`true`在方法呼叫傳回，或該物件會停用。

trans-unit.source: Although an object's `consistent` bit can change repeatedly within each method call, only the last change counts.
trans-unit.target: 雖然物件`consistent`元中可能會改變重複每個方法呼叫，只有最後一個變更的計數。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionVote"></xref> values, either <xref uid="langword_csharp_Commit" name="Commit" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Abort" name="Abort" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionVote"></xref> values, either <xref uid="langword_csharp_Commit" name="Commit" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Abort" name="Abort" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a GUID for the current partition.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的資料分割的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID for the current partition.
trans-unit.target: 目前的資料分割的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows XP or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows XP 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""></xref> bit to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and the <xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""></xref> bit to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""></xref>位元<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>和<xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""></xref>位元<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> COM + 內容中。

trans-unit.source: If asked, the context votes to abort the current transaction, and the object is deactivated on method return.
trans-unit.target: 中止目前交易中，如果系統詢問，投票內容和方法傳回時停用的物件。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""></xref> bit and the <xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""></xref> bit to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_consistent" name="consistent" href=""></xref>位元和<xref uid="langword_csharp_done" name="done" href=""></xref>位元<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> COM + 內容中。

trans-unit.source: If asked, the COM+ context will commit the current transaction, and the object is deactivated on method return.
trans-unit.target: COM + 內容要求，如果將會認可目前交易，並在方法傳回的物件時停用。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: Sets the named property for the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 設定 COM + 內容的具名的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for obtaining the Internet Information Services (IIS) intrinsic objects provided by Active Server Pages (ASP).
trans-unit.target: 這是用於取得提供由 Active Server Pages (ASP) 的網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 內建函式物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to set.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Object that represents the property value to set.
trans-unit.target: 物件，代表要設定的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的交易內容。

trans-unit.source: If no transaction context exists when this property is accessed, a new transaction context is created and returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性經過存取時，就會不存在任何交易內容，在新的交易內容建立，並傳回。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> that represents the current transaction context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"> </xref> ，代表目前的交易內容。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object describing the current COM+ DTC transaction.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，描述目前的 COM + DTC 交易。

trans-unit.source: The returned object supports the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> interface if the transaction is a COM+ DTC transaction.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的物件支援<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction>介面的 COM + DTC 交易的交易是否。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 物件，代表目前的交易。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID of the current COM+ DTC transaction.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的 COM + DTC 交易的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: A GUID representing the current COM+ DTC transaction, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: GUID，代表目前的 COM + DTC 交易中，如果有一個存在。

trans-unit.source: There is no COM+ context available.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的 COM + 內容。

trans-unit.source: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 平台不是 Windows 2000 或更新版本。
